title: NewSphereHitbox​
content: </> SimpleHitbox.NewSphereHitbox( inst: Instance? -- Instance the hitbox should follow ) → () Create a new sphere hitbox. ::caution Providing an Instance will only set the sphere hitbox's position. You must manually set the radius. ::

title: NewPartHitbox​
content: </> SimpleHitbox.NewPartHitbox( inst: Instance -- Part for the hitbox or instance containing parts for the hitbox ) → () Create a new part hitbox.

title: NewBoxHitbox​
content: </> SimpleHitbox.NewBoxHitbox( inst: Instance? -- Instance the hitbox should follow. The hitbox' size will also be taken from the instance if it has a size. ) → () Create a new box hitbox.

title: OverlapParams​
content: </> SphereHitbox.OverlapParams: OverlapParams The overlap parameters for the hitbox.

title: Position​
content: </> SphereHitbox.Position: Vector3  The position of the hitbox. WARNING Setting this position won't update the hitbox if you have provided an instance for it to follow! local sphereHitbox = SimpleHitbox.NewSphereHitbox() sphereHitbox.Position = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)

title: Radius​
content: </> SphereHitbox.Radius: number The radius of the hitbox. local sphereHitbox = SimpleHitbox.NewSphereHitbox() sphereHitbox.Radius = 5

title: OnHit​
content: </> SphereHitbox.OnHit: Signal Fired when the hitbox gets a hit on a player. local sphereHitbox = SimpleHitbox.NewSphereHitbox() sphereHitbox.OverlapParams = OverlapParams.new() sphereHitbox:HitStart() sphereHitbox.OnHit:Connect(function(hit, humanoid) print("Hit!") end)

title: HitStart​
content: </> SphereHitbox:HitStart( maxTime: number?-- Maximum time the hitbox can stay on for. Once this runs out, the hitbox will automatically stop listening for hits. ) → () Start listening for hits. WARNING The position, radius and overlap parameters must be specified before calling this function!

title: HitStop​
content: </> SphereHitbox:HitStop() → () Stop listening for hits.

title: Destroy​
content: </> SphereHitbox:Destroy() → () Destroy the hitbox. This automatically calls HitStop and destroys the signal. WARNING The hitbox will be unusable once this is called!
